description:
The marketplace god spoke.
"The Ability Cards will inevitably spread, inevitably become obsolete,
and the market will return to its everyday routine."
But contrary to the god's intent, the value of the cards is somehow rising further and further.
Could someone be manipulating their value?
Or could it be because a select few collectors are buying up all the stock?
When the card market had reached the utter peak of chaos,
markets that the god couldn't intervene in--"black markets"--began to open.
(from thpatch.net)
game: Black Market of Bulletphilia ~ 100th Black Market

unstable.description:
0.1.0 Version of AP implementation for **Black Market of Bulletphilia ~ 100th Black Market**, also known as **Touhou 18.5**. **Minimum AP Launcher version** is 0.6.6. Recommended to play on Windows, as **the game does not support Linux natively**. Linux support for the client might come later.

See Options Creator for customization options.

# Starting Conditions

- You will begin the game with no stages unlocked, no cards unlocked, and no Funds.
- You may choose to have any stages unlocked by adding their respective item to **Start Inventory from Pool** (e.g. "1st Market - Secret Heaven Cliff", "3rd Market - Sai no Kawara", etc.).
- For beginners, it is recommended to give yourself "**Tutorial - First Black Market Deal**" via the above option.
- The client will **automatically** save your progress and restore it according to server data. You will receive your unlocked stages, cards, Funds, card slots, and equipment cost upon a successful connection. **_Local save data/Steam save data is not needed for this reason._**

# Requirements and Setup

Of course, you will need **Touhou 18.5: 100th Black Market** installed first. Both the Steam release and Comiket CD release should work in this regard.

- The game's executable name should be "th185.exe".

**Before booting up the game**, please do the following:

- (Optional) Backup your save data in a safe place.
- Disable Steam's Cloud saving feature for the game. This can be done in Settings -> Properties... -> General -> Steam Cloud.
- Open the client. This would be "Touhou 18.5 Client" in the Archipelago Launcher.
- Check if your save data directory is correct. This is usually %appdata%/ShanghaiAlice/th185, but your system may differ.
- Run /replace_save.
- Connect to your desired Archipelago room.

You may launch the game afterwards. If you are in the middle of gameplay and wish to switch rooms, it is recommended to close both the game and the client. Running /replace_save before booting up the game again is necessary.

Can be played with thcrap's English patch, as thcrap's patching method will not directly modify the game's files. However, this repository will _**not**_ provide thcrap nor any of its data.
unstable.title: HBM 0.1.0 - AP0.6.6

unstable-0.1.1.description:
Version 0.1.1 of the AP implementation for **Black Market of Bulletphilia ~ 100th Black Market**, also known as **Touhou 18.5**. **Minimum AP Launcher version** is 0.6.6. Recommended to play on Windows, as **the game does not support Linux natively**. Linux support for the client might come later.

# Changelog

- Recommended Cards in Logic option now has an actual effect during generation.
- The client remembers the last processed item.
- The client properly processes Useful and Filler items.

(the sections below are from the previous release)
See Options Creator for customization options.

# Starting Conditions

- You will begin the game with no stages unlocked, no cards unlocked, and no Funds.
- You may choose to have any stages unlocked by adding their respective item to **Start Inventory from Pool** (e.g. "1st Market - Secret Heaven Cliff", "3rd Market - Sai no Kawara", etc.).
- For beginners, it is recommended to give yourself "**Tutorial - First Black Market Deal**" via the above option.
- The client will **automatically** save your progress and restore it according to server data. You will receive your unlocked stages, cards, Funds, card slots, and equipment cost upon a successful connection. **_Local save data/Steam save data is not needed for this reason._**

# Requirements and Setup

Of course, you will need **Touhou 18.5: 100th Black Market** installed first. Both the Steam release and Comiket CD release should work in this regard.

- The game's executable name should be "th185.exe".

**Before booting up the game**, please do the following:

- (Optional) Backup your save data in a safe place.
- Disable Steam's Cloud saving feature for the game. This can be done in Settings -> Properties... -> General -> Steam Cloud.
- Open the client. This would be "Touhou 18.5 Client" in the Archipelago Launcher.
- Check if your save data directory is correct. This is usually %appdata%/ShanghaiAlice/th185, but your system may differ.
- Run /replace_save.
- Connect to your desired Archipelago room.

You may launch the game afterwards. If you are in the middle of gameplay and wish to switch rooms, it is recommended to close both the game and the client. Running /replace_save before booting up the game again is necessary.

Can be played with thcrap's English patch, as thcrap's patching method will not directly modify the game's files. However, this repository will _**not**_ provide thcrap nor any of its data.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/compare/unstable...unstable-0.1.1
unstable-0.1.1.title: 0.1.1 - AP0.6.6

unstable-0.1.2.description:
Version 0.1.2 of the AP implementation for **Black Market of Bulletphilia ~ 100th Black Market**, also known as **Touhou 18.5**. **Minimum AP Launcher version** is 0.6.6. Recommended to play on Windows, as **the game does not support Linux natively**. Linux support for the client might come later.

# Changelog

- Fixed client not properly handling save data when connecting to the server for the second time onwards.
- Added more Filler items.
- Added generation option to disable non-monetary Filler items.

Existing runs started before this release will **not** have these new Filler items added to them.
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/compare/unstable-0.1.1...unstable-0.1.2

# Game Details and Setup
- See **game details** [here](https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/th185/docs/en_100th%20Black%20Market.md). When exporting .yaml files for this game, it is recommended to use the Options Creator in the Archipelago Launcher for a smooth experience.
- See the **setup guide** [here](https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/th185/docs/setup_en.md).
unstable-0.1.2.title: 0.1.2 - AP 0.6.6

unstable-0.1.3.description:
Release version 0.1.3 of the AP implementation for **Black Market of Bulletphilia ~ 100th Black Market**, also known as **Touhou 18.5**. **Minimum AP Launcher version** is 0.6.6. Recommended to play on Windows, as **the game does not support Linux natively**. Linux support for the client might come later.

# Changelog

- Fixed client allowing for generation without a starting stage in **Start Inventory from Pool**. This will now throw a `FillError`.
- Fixed certain Filler items not taking effect in-game.
- Fixed Traps not showing up during generation.
- Fixed **Include Non-Money Filler** option not doing anything during generation.
- Fixed error when the client checks for victory if the completion goal is set to anything involving **All Cards Owned**.
- Added more Filler and Trap items.
- Slightly changed the description of the option **Recommended Loadout in Logic** for clarification.
- Removed option to remove Ability Card dex checks. This did not do anything before.
- Updated game details docs to list the new Filler and Trap items.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/compare/unstable-0.1.2...unstable-0.1.3

# Game Details and Setup
- See **game details** [here](https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/th185/docs/en_100th%20Black%20Market.md). When exporting .yaml files for this game, it is recommended to use the Options Creator in the Archipelago Launcher for a smooth experience.
- See the **setup guide** [here](https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/th185/docs/setup_en.md).
unstable-0.1.3.title: 0.1.3 - AP 0.6.6

unstable-0.1.4.description:
Release version 0.1.4 of the AP implementation for **Black Market of Bulletphilia ~ 100th Black Market**, also known as **Touhou 18.5**. **Minimum AP Launcher version** is 0.6.6. Recommended to play on Windows, as **the game does not support Linux natively**. Linux support for the client might come later.

# Changelog

- Added item groups: `Limited Items`, `Filler`, `Stages`, `Traps`, and `Ability Cards`.
- Added location groups. The group names all correspond to the names of the Stage Unlock items. Only Ability Card Dex checks are not grouped into stages.
- Updated docs.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/compare/unstable-0.1.3...unstable-0.1.4

# Game Details and Setup
- See **game details** [here](https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/th185/docs/en_100th%20Black%20Market.md). When exporting .yaml files for this game, it is recommended to use the Options Creator in the Archipelago Launcher for a smooth experience.
- See the **setup guide** [here](https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/th185/docs/setup_en.md).
unstable-0.1.4.title: 0.1.4 - AP 0.6.6

unstable-0.2.0.description:
Archipelago Randomizer implementation for **_Black Market of Bulletphilia ~ 100th Black Market_**, also known as _**Touhou 18.5**_.

- **APWorld version:** Unstable 0.2.0
- **Minimum Archipelago Launcher version:** 0.6.6

Recommended to play on Windows, as **the game does not support Linux natively**. If playing on Linux, it is recommended to run both Archipelago Launcher and the game in Wine/Proton.

# Changelog

- Added `Death Link`.
- Added `Energy Link`. Energy can be exchanged via one client command for Funds (and, optionally, Bullet Money).
- Updated docs.
- Minor adjustments to DataStorage string keys.
- Minor generation logic fixes.
- Removed some unused files.

This release features **a few breaking changes** that would inconvenience players running version 0.1.4 and below. It is recommended to finish _all_ runs started before this release before playing this version.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/compare/unstable-0.1.4...unstable-0.2.0

# Game Details and Setup
- See **game details** [here](https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/th185/docs/en_100th%20Black%20Market.md). When exporting .yaml files for this game, it is recommended to use the Options Creator in the Archipelago Launcher for a smooth experience.
- See the **setup guide** [here](https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/th185/docs/setup_en.md).
unstable-0.2.0.title: 0.2.0 - AP 0.6.6

unstable-0.2.3.description:
Archipelago Randomizer implementation for **_Black Market of Bulletphilia ~ 100th Black Market_**, also known as _**Touhou 18.5**_.

- **APWorld version:** Unstable 0.2.3
- **Minimum Archipelago Launcher version:** 0.6.6

Recommended to play on Windows, as **the game does not support Linux natively**. If playing on Linux, it is recommended to run both Archipelago Launcher and the game in Wine/Proton.

# Changelog

- Added option `Starting Market`.
- Fixed Death Links of the stage fail category sending deaths when the player has 1 extra life.
- Fixed generation rules to not run into issues for certain options for `Starting Market`.
- Non-money traps are now included as non-money filler that can be removed during generation.
- Changed Aunn's card name "Ferocious Komainu" to "Unleash the Guardian Hounds".
- Updated docs.

Compatible with previous releases since 0.2.0.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/compare/unstable-0.2.2...unstable-0.2.3

# Game Details and Setup
- See **game details** [here](https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/th185/docs/en_100th%20Black%20Market.md). When exporting .yaml files for this game, it is recommended to use the Options Creator in the Archipelago Launcher for a smooth experience.
- See the **setup guide** [here](https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/th185/docs/setup_en.md).
unstable-0.2.3.title: 0.2.3 - AP 0.6.6

unstable-0.2.4.description:
Archipelago Randomizer implementation for **_Black Market of Bulletphilia ~ 100th Black Market_**, also known as _**Touhou 18.5**_.

- **Ap world version:** Unstable 0.2.4
- **Minimum Archipelago Launcher version:** 0.6.6

Recommended to play on Windows, as **the game does not support Linux natively**. If playing on Linux, it is recommended to run both Archipelago Launcher and the game in Wine/Proton.

# Changelog

- Fixed a bug where the client was trying to connect to the window resolution menu on Linux instead of the game.
- Added option **Progressive Markets**. Stages can now be unlocked in a sequential order instead of requiring specific stage unlocks via finding "Progressive Market" items. This option is enabled by default in the Options menu, but can be toggled.

Compatible with runs started before this release.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/compare/unstable-0.2.3...unstable-0.2.4

# Game Details and Setup
- See **game details** [here](https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/th185/docs/en_100th%20Black%20Market.md). When exporting .yaml files for this game, it is recommended to use the Options Creator in the Archipelago Launcher for a smooth experience.
- See the **setup guide** [here](https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/th185/docs/setup_en.md).

unstable-0.3.0.description:
Archipelago Randomizer implementation for **_Black Market of Bulletphilia ~ 100th Black Market_**, also known as _**Touhou 18.5**_.

- **Ap world version:** Unstable 0.3.0
- **Minimum Archipelago Launcher version:** 0.6.6

Recommended to play on Windows, as **the game does not support Linux natively**. If playing on Linux, it is recommended to run both Archipelago Launcher and the game in Wine/Proton.

# Changelog

- **Added new checks**: Music Room soundtrack unlocks and Achievements.
- Updated the AP-tailored scorefile to accommodate the above.
- Added Options for the above. Music Room and Achievement checks are disabled by default, but can be enabled.
- Disabled the stage unlock alerts that appear after completing a stage.
- Disabled the stage select cursor incrementing after completing a stage.
- Updated docs.

It is recommended to finish any runs started _before_ this release before updating.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/compare/unstable-0.2.4...unstable-0.3.0

# Game Details and Setup

- See the **setup guide** [here](https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/th185/docs/setup_en.md).

unstable-0.3.3.description:
Archipelago Randomizer implementation for **_Black Market of Bulletphilia ~ 100th Black Market_**, also known as _**Touhou 18.5**_.

- **Ap world version:** Unstable 0.3.3
- **Minimum Archipelago Launcher version:** 0.6.6

Recommended to play on Windows, as **the game does not support Linux natively**. If playing on Linux, it is recommended to run both Archipelago Launcher and the game in Wine/Proton.

# Changelog

- Fixed same names in Ability Card location strings unintentionally checking off certain Ability Card locations.
- Fixed `Achievement #11` not immediately unlocking upon reaching max equipment slots.
- Slightly diversified Death Link messages.
- Updated location groups to include Music Room and Achievement locations.
- Updated client to show the ID of unknown items received.
- Updated client to check for boss clears via hidden game records. This does not break anything in practice.
- Updated AP-specific scorefile to be cleaner.
- Updated internal Options names for Death Link Trigger. This breaks .yaml files generated before this release.

Compatible with releases since 0.3.0.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/compare/unstable-0.3.2...unstable-0.3.3

# Game Details and Setup
- See **game details** [here](https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/th185/docs/en_100th%20Black%20Market.md). When exporting .yaml files for this game, it is recommended to use the Options Creator in the Archipelago Launcher for a smooth experience.
- See the **setup guide** [here](https://github.com/furret78/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/th185/docs/setup_en.md).
